entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 1.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
